edm:ProvidedCHO.dc:title: Band I: 4 performances by Marina Abromovic 1975-1976; 60 minuten 1) Art must be beautiful - Artists must be beautiful, 1975 2) Freeing the voice, 1976 3) Freeing the body, 1976 4) Freeing the memory, 1976
A performance Anthology Volume I-II
Band II: An Event by Ulay, 1976 30 minuten

Band III: Relation work 17 performances by Ulay and Marina Abramovic, 1976-1980 180 minuten 1) Relation in space, 1976 2) Talking about Similarity, 1976 3) Breathing in - Breathing out 1977 4) Imponderabilia, 1977 5) Expansion in space, 1977 6) Relation in movement, 1977 7) Relation in time, 1977 8) Light/ Dark, 1977 9) Balance Proof, 1977 10) AAA - AAA, 1978 11) Incision, 1978 12) Kaiserschnitt, 1978 13) Charged Space, 1978 14) Three, 1978 15) That self, 1980 16) Rest Energy, 1980 17) Nature of Mind, 1980
